sen.j: 在原氏（ありわらし）は、平城天皇皇子の阿保親王・高岳親王の子男が臣籍降下したことに興る皇別氏族（賜姓皇族参照）。
sen.e: The Ariwara clan originated from Emperor Heizei's Prince, Imperial Prince Abo and Imperial Prince Takaoka's children made demotion from nobility to subject, and they were the clan who's s ancestors were from Imperial family. (please refer to the Imperial family who made demotion from nobility to subject.)

sen.e: They had days of obsculty during Emperor Montoku's era, however the Aariwara clan became successful in Emperor Seiwa's era.

sen.e: Once powerful clans established daigaku besso (a dormitory facility built near the University for court noble's children), the Ariwara clan also established Shogakuin and send their children to study.
